text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: What?! You're leaving the team?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Only temporarily, mind you. I've some<n>urgent family matters
to attend to.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Waaah! With you gone, who am I<n>gonna mess with for fun?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: How about you don't mess with<n>anybody for once?!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: It'll feel lonely with you gone...

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yeah... You're our ace...

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: McQueen, come back soon, okay?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Of course. I'm not done running yet.<n>I'll be back before you
know it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I have come to know this team as a<n>place where we look
out for one<n>another, where we are free to race<n>toward our
dreams.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Please, treasure the bonds that<n>we've forged.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And Rice...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yes?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I hope to see you pursue your own<n>dream... of becoming a
runner people<n>will be glad to see win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sob. McQueeeeen!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After a heartfelt farewell, McQueen<n>steps away from the
team for a time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few months later, Rice Shower<n>begins to struggle once
again.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
In front is Biwa Hayahide! And Biwa<n>Hayahide is first
across the finish line!<n>The bane of McQueen, Rice Shower,<n>
comes in fifth!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: It's just loss after loss for Rice<n>Shower.

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
After standing in the way of Bourbon<n>and McQueen's
records, too. Like,<n>c'mon, try a little harder.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's one question on<n>everybody's mind—where did that<n>
Rice Shower go?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Your performance on the final stretch<n>isn't bad. How does it
feel?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Your performance on the final stretch<n>isn't bad. How does it
feel?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I feel like I can catch up to the lead,<n>and I know I'm not
running out of<n>stamina, but...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: To be honest, the cause of her losing<n>streak still eludes me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Winning the spring Tenno Sho gave<n>her a boost of
confidence and<n>optimism.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But her results in every race since<n>haven't showed that.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maybe it's still the booing getting to<n>her, even if she
doesn't realize it.
choice_data_list: Do you want to step away from racing for a bit?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...No, I'll keep running.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I told myself that no matter how much<n>I lose, or how many
people boo me,<n>I'll still stand tall.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Besides, I need to become someonefans want to win. I promisedMcQueen.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I'm going for another lap!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But there's no end in sight for her<n>slump.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And next we have Rice Shower,<n>who's been on a losing
streak. Will<n>she return to form in this race?

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: She's just gonna lose again.

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: I mean, she tries hard, you gotta give<n>her that.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Fair. Takes a lot to not give up after<n>losing so much...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower finishes in sixth!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Where is the Rice Shower who once<n>stood in Mihono
Bourbon and Mejiro<n>McQueen's way?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Sigh.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heheh... Couldn't win today either.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She forces a smile, but she's already<n>welling up...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...No, I won't cry. If I'm going to cry, I<n>want it to be tears of
joy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: All right, back to training! C'mon,<n>Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she runs off, her steps seem<n>incredibly light for one who
just<n>suffered a heavy loss.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: What can I do to make sure her next<n>tears are tears of joy?
